TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StaticSiteMapProvider extends System.Web.SiteMapProvider
Public MustInherit Class StaticSiteMapProvider Inherits SiteMapProvider
public ref class StaticSiteMapProvider abstract : System::Web::SiteMapProvider

summary.span: 做為抽象 類別的部分實作，以及做為 ASP.NET 預設網站導覽提供者 類別的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as a partial implementation of the abstract class and serves as a base class for the class, which is the default site map provider in ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象的部分實作類別，並提供兩種其他方法：和，以及抽象和受保護方法。The class is a partial implementation of the abstract class and supplies two additional methods: and , as well as the abstract and protected methods. 類別支援寫入站台地圖提供者 (例如， ) 轉譯會儲存在永續性儲存體來儲存在記憶體中的其中一個站台對應。The class supports writing a site map provider (for example, an ) that translates a site map that is stored in persistent storage to one that is stored in memory. 類別提供儲存和擷取的基本實作物件。The class provides basic implementations for storing and retrieving objects. 和類別支援的站台對應提供者階層，其中的站台對應提供者可以與其他站台對應提供者有階層式關聯性的概念。The and classes support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy, where a site map provider can have a hierarchical relationship with other site map providers. 使用實作此模式和屬性。This pattern is implemented with the and properties. 類別儲存其雜湊表中的物件，並在內部使用頁面中，站台對應節點，做為索引鍵所代表的屬性。The class stores its objects in hash tables and internally uses the property of the pages, represented by site map nodes, as keys. （如果站台對應節點沒有指定 URL，它會追蹤使用自動產生的唯一索引鍵。）如此一來，您不能有具有相同 URL 的站台對應節點其中使用一次以上的站台對應節點。(If a site map node does not specify a URL, it is tracked using an automatically generated unique key.) As a result, you cannot have site map nodes wherein a site map node with the same URL is used more than once. 例如，嘗試載入使用的下列程式碼範例所示的站台對應節點類別，這是預設 ASP.NET 網站對應提供者或衍生自任何站台對應供應商，所以無法使用類別AboutUs.aspx 頁面使用超過一次。For example, attempting to load the site map node illustrated in the following code example with the class, which is the default ASP.NET site map provider, or any site map provider that is derived from the class will not work because the AboutUs.aspx page is used more than once. ``` ``` 如果您要擴充類別，三個最重要的方法是， ，和方法。If you are extending the class, the three most important methods are the , , and methods. 和方法都具有已足夠完成大多數的自訂站台對應提供者實作的預設實作。The and methods have default implementations that are sufficient for most custom site map provider implementations. 方法呼叫以初始化衍生的站台對應提供者，包括載入網站導覽資料所需的任何資源，但它會嘗試建立站台對應節點，在記憶體中的。The method is called to initialize derived site map providers, including any resources that are required to load site map data, but it does attempt to build the site map node in memory. 如果您的衍生的類別來儲存站台地圖資料使用檔案，可以在此執行任何檔案初始化。If your derived class is using files to store site map data, any file initialization can be performed here. 如果站台對應節點使用其他類型的資料存放區，例如關聯式資料庫中，連接可能會執行初始化這裡。If the site map node uses some other type of data store, such as a relational database, initializing a connection might be performed here. 其他屬性，例如檔案名稱或放置在組態中的站台對應提供者項目的連接字串是由 ASP.NET 組態系統處理並且傳遞給方法`attributes`參數。Additional attributes, such as file names or connection strings that are placed on the site map provider element in the configuration are processed by the ASP.NET configuration system and passed to the method with the `attributes` parameter. 所有衍生自的類別必須覆寫方法類別，並呼叫從永續性儲存體載入站台對應節點，並將它轉換成內部表示法。The method must be overridden by all classes that are derived from the class and is called to load the site map node from persistent storage and convert it to an internal representation. 中許多預設成員的實作在內部呼叫方法和類別。The method is called internally in many of the default member implementations of the and classes. 如果您實作您自己的站台地圖提供者，請確定站台對應的資料處理發生一次，後續呼叫方法立即傳回，如果尚未載入站台對應資訊。If you implement your own site map provider, ensure that site map data processing occurs once and subsequent calls to the method return immediately, if site map information has already been loaded. 當您實作方法，請確定它是安全執行緒，因為多個並行的網頁要求可能會導致間接載入站台對應資訊的多個呼叫。When you implement the method, ensure it is thread safe, as multiple concurrent page requests can result indirectly in multiple calls to load site map information. 站台對應基礎結構支援顯示使用者的角色為基礎的站台對應資訊。The site map infrastructure supports displaying site map information based on the user's role. 取決於屬性所支援的個別物件不同的巡覽結構可以存在不同的使用者。Depending on the property that are supported by the individual objects, a different navigation structure can exist for different users. 站台的預設實作對應的節點擷取成員類別來執行安全性調整自動呼叫方法。The default implementations of the site map node retrieval members of the class perform security trimming automatically by calling the method. ，和方法操作可用來以執行緒安全的方式追蹤網站導覽節點的內部集合。The , and methods manipulate the internal collections that are used to track site map nodes in a thread-safe manner. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何您擴充類別，作為站台地圖提供者的 Microsoft Access。The following code example demonstrates how you to extend the class to use Microsoft Access as a site map provider. `AccessSiteMapProvider`類別是支援只有簡單、 一個層級深階層的站台對應提供者。The `AccessSiteMapProvider` class is a site map provider that supports only a simple, one-level-deep hierarchy. 站台對應資料會儲存在資料表具有下列結構：The table that the site map data is stored in has the following structure: ``` NODEID URL NAME PARENTNODEID --------------------------------------------- 1 default.aspx Default 2 catalog.aspx Catalog 1 3 aboutus.aspx Contact Us 1 ... ``` `AccessSiteMapProvider`類別衍生自類別，並從 Microsoft Access 資料庫，使用基本的 SQL 查詢會擷取其資訊和和物件。The `AccessSiteMapProvider` class is derived from the class and retrieves its information from a Microsoft Access database using basic SQL queries and the and objects. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#1)] 最後，`AccessSiteMapProvider`設定為下列 Web.config 檔案中的預設提供者。Finally, the `AccessSiteMapProvider` is configured as the default provider in the following Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks **請注意**這個類別無法直接執行個體化。**Note** This class is not instantiated directly. 這個建構函式會從衍生自類別的建構函式呼叫類別。This constructor is called from the constructor of classes that are derived from the class.

summary.span: 將 加入至網站導覽提供者所管理的集合中，並建立 物件之間的父子關係。

span.span: Adds a to the collections that are maintained by the site map provider and establishes a parent/child relationship between the objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由站台對應節點`node`參數會加入至內部集合，而且它與所識別的站台對應節點之間建立父子式關聯性`parentNode`參數。The site map node that is identified by the `node` parameter is added to an internal collection and a parent-child relationship is created between it and the site map node that is identified by the `parentNode` parameter. 加入至內部集合時，可能會解譯網站導覽節點的 URL。The URL for a site map node might be interpreted when it is added to the internal collections. 應用程式相對和相對 Url 會展開成應用程式絕對虛擬路徑，然後在內部會使用儲存及存取個別的執行個體之類別。Application-relative and relative URLs are expanded to application-absolute virtual paths, which are then used internally to store and access the individual instances of the class. 其他的 Url，例如實體路徑、 通訊協定、 路徑和 UNC 路徑，不會被解譯。Other URLs, such as physical paths, paths with protocols in them, and UNC paths, are not interpreted. 類別，衍生自類別，且是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者，會使用屬性物件做為查閱索引鍵中，依預設其內部集合。The class, which is derived from the class, and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果屬性已經設定，它必須是唯一的站台對應提供者的範圍內。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 方法嘗試擷取站台對應節點，根據其屬性。The method attempts to retrieve site map nodes based on their property. 否則，您可以使用屬性和對應方法來擷取站台對應的節點。Otherwise, you can use the property and the corresponding method to retrieve site map nodes. 如果沒有或指定，則站台地圖提供者會自動產生追蹤網站導覽節點。If no or is specified, the site map provider automatically generates a to track the site map nodes.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 已使用 註冊過 或 。

span.span: The or is already registered with the .

exception.span: 網站導覽節點的組成網頁必須具有唯一 URL 或索引鍵。

span.span: A site map node must be made up of pages with unique URLs or keys.

para.span: 在覆寫方法，請確認屬性設為唯一的值，新增站台對應節點使用時方法。

span.span: When overriding the method, ensure that the property is set to a unique value when adding the site map node using the method.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，從持續性儲存體載入網站導覽資訊，並在記憶體中建置它。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads the site map information from persistent storage and builds it in memory.
The root of the site map navigation structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一個抽象成員類別。The method is the one abstract member of the class. 呼叫方法來載入和建置從永續性儲存體的站台對應節點。The method is called to load and build the site map node from persistent storage. 當您實作方法，確保它是安全執行緒，因為多個並行的網頁要求可能會導致間接載入站台對應資訊的多個呼叫。When you implement the method, ensure that it is thread-safe, because multiple concurrent page requests can result indirectly in multiple calls to load site map information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法，以從 Microsoft Access 資料庫擷取資料，並建置物件加入至根網站對應節點的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method to retrieve data from a Microsoft Access database and build objects that are added to the collection of the root site map node. 最後，屬性會傳回給呼叫者。Finally, the property is returned to the caller. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#4)]

para.span: 覆寫時方法在衍生類別中，請務必將正規化的 Url物件加入至您站台對應提供者，以便方法可以擷取站台對應節點，不論網站 URL節點會提供當做應用程式相對路徑或絕對虛擬路徑。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to normalize the URLs of objects that you add to your site map provider, so that the method can retrieve a site map node regardless of whether the URL for the site map node is supplied as an absolute virtual path or application relative path.

para.span: 站台對應提供者實作器使用方法應該正規化儲存之前的任何 Url代表站台地圖提供者的內部雜湊資料表中的物件。

span.span: Site map provider implementers using the method should normalize any URLs before storing objects in the internal hash tables on behalf of the site map provider.

para.span: 安全性修剪行為值包含在和類別實作。

span.span: Security trimming behavior is included in the and class implementations.

para.span: 不過，對於安全性調整函式在衍生類別中，您必須設定屬性的任何您覆寫時，建立站台地圖提供者時所建立的物件方法。

span.span: However, for security trimming to function in derived classes, you must set the property of any objects that you create while building a site map provider when you override the method.

summary.span: 移除子系和父代網站導覽節點集合中的所有項目，這些網站導覽節點是 在維護其狀態時所追蹤。

span.span: Removes all elements in the collections of child and parent site map nodes that the tracks as part of its state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫維護方法來執行其他清除作業，視何種狀態的衍生的類別。Classes that are derived from the class can override the method to perform additional cleanup, depending on what state the derived classes maintain. 方法不重設過程中初始化的狀態方法，它會唯一過程中初始化的狀態重設方法。The method does not reset state that is initialized during the method—it resets only state that is initialized during the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法來執行其他清除作業是由類別維護狀態。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to perform additional cleanup of state that is maintained by the class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的 URL 通常是虛擬的或絕對的 URL。The provided URL is typically a virtual or absolute URL. 它也可以使用 ASP.NET 應用程式相對的語法，例如 URL `"~/apprelativedirectory"`。It can also be a URL that uses ASP.NET application-relative syntax, such as `"~/apprelativedirectory"`. 類別會自動正規化絕對虛擬路徑的相對應用程式的原始 Url。The class automatically normalizes application-relative raw URLs to an absolute virtual path. 物件，衍生自且是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者，會使用屬性物件做為查閱索引鍵中，依預設其內部集合。The object, which is derived from the and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果屬性已經設定，它必須是唯一的站台對應提供者的範圍內。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 方法嘗試擷取站台對應節點，根據其。The method attempts to retrieve site map nodes based on their . 否則，您可以使用屬性和對應方法來擷取站台對應的節點。Otherwise, you can use the property and the corresponding method to retrieve site map nodes. 如果沒有或指定，則站台地圖提供者會自動產生追蹤網站導覽節點屬性。If no or is specified, the site map provider automatically generates a property to track the site map nodes.

span.span: is .

para.span: 覆寫時方法在衍生類別中，請務必將正規化的 Url物件加入至您站台對應提供者，以便方法可以擷取站台對應節點，不論網站的 URL節點會提供應用程式相對路徑為絕對虛擬路徑。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to normalize the URLs of the objects that you add to your site map provider, so that the method can retrieve a site map node regardless of whether URL for the site map node is supplied as an absolute virtual path or an application relative path.

para.span: 安全性修剪行為值包含在和類別實作。

span.span: However, for security trimming to function in derived classes, you must set the property of any objects that you create while building a site map provider when you override the method.

returns.span: 表示 所識別之網頁的 ，如果安全性調整已啟用並且網站導覽節點無法對目前使用者顯示，或無法使用 在網站導覽節點集合中找到該網站導覽節點，則為 。

span.span: A that represents the page identified by ; otherwise, , if security trimming is enabled and the site map node cannot be shown to the current user or the site map node is not found in the site map node collection by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從內部擷取站台對應節點物件根據`key`。The method retrieves a site map node from an internal object based on `key`. 物件，衍生自類別且為 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者，會使用屬性物件做為查閱索引鍵中，依預設其內部集合。The object, which is derived from the class and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果屬性已經設定，它必須是唯一的站台對應提供者的範圍內。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 方法嘗試擷取站台對應節點，根據其。The method attempts to retrieve site map nodes based on their . 否則，您可以使用屬性和對應方法來擷取站台對應的節點。Otherwise, you can use the property and the corresponding method to retrieve site map nodes. 其查詢的執行個體的預設實作類別，根據`key`參數。The has a default implementation that looks up instances of the class based on the `key` parameter. 如果使用站台對應提供者實作器方法，已經將儲存至每個參考根據值屬性。If a site map provider implementer used the method, the already will have stored a reference to each based on the value of the property. 根據預設，會產生 Guid 的執行個體沒有值的類別屬性。By default, the generates GUIDs for instances of the class that do not have a value for the property. 自訂站台對應提供者實作者必須提供自己的機制來產生唯一值屬性的執行個體類別沒有值屬性。Custom site map provider implementers must provide their own mechanism for generating unique values of the property in the event that an instance of the class does not have a value for the property. 和類別之外，也就是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者實作，使用的 URL做為索引鍵中的維護類別的各種集合物件。The and classes, which are the default site map provider implementation for ASP.NET, use the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection GetChildNodes (System.Web.SiteMapNode node);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection GetChildNodes(class System.Web.SiteMapNode node) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetChildNodes (node As SiteMapNode) As SiteMapNodeCollection
public: override System::Web::SiteMapNodeCollection ^ GetChildNodes(System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ node);

param.name: node
param.span: ，要擷取其所有子系網站導覽節點。

span.span: The for which to retrieve all child site map nodes.

summary.span: 擷取特定 物件的子系網站導覽節點。

span.span: Retrieves the child site map nodes of a specific object.

returns.span: 唯讀 ，包含 的子系網站導覽節點。

span.span: A read-only that contains the child site map nodes of .

returns.span: 如果安全性調整已啟用，則集合只包含使用者允許檢視的網站導覽節點。

span.span: If security trimming is enabled, the collection contains only site map nodes that the user is permitted to see.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來追蹤及其子系和父站台對應節點的站台對應提供者委派物件。The objects delegate to the site map provider to keep track of their child and parent site map nodes. 如此一來，實作階層式的站台的站台對應提供者的類別對應結構，例如，並使用物件來代表站台對應節點，必須為了能夠追蹤所有的站台對應節點的階層式關聯性瀏覽整個階層式樹狀結構。As a result, classes that implement a site map provider for a hierarchical site map structure, such as , and use objects to represent site map nodes, must track the hierarchical relationships of all site map nodes in order to be able to navigate an entire hierarchical tree. 方法呼叫方法在內部擷取唯讀是相對於指定的站台對應節點和與目前使用者相關的站台對應節點的集合。The method calls the method internally to retrieve read-only collection of site map nodes that are relative to the specified site map node and relevant to the current user.

span.span: is .

param.name: node
param.span: ，要擷取其父代網站導覽節點。

span.span: The for which to retrieve the parent site map node.

summary.span: 擷取特定 物件的父代網站導覽節點。

span.span: Retrieves the parent site map node of a specific object.

returns.span: ，表示指定之 的父代，如果父代網站導覽節點不存在，或使用者不允許檢視該父代網站導覽節點，則為 。

span.span: A that represents the parent of the specified ; otherwise, , if no parent site map node exists or the user is not permitted to see the parent site map node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來追蹤及其子系和父站台對應節點的站台對應提供者委派物件。The objects delegate to the site map provider to keep track of their child and parent site map nodes. 如此一來，實作階層式的站台的站台對應提供者的類別對應結構，例如類別，並使用物件來代表站台對應節點，必須為了追蹤所有的站台對應節點的階層式關聯性無法瀏覽整個階層式樹狀結構。As a result, classes that implement a site map provider for a hierarchical site map structure, such as the class, and use objects to represent site map nodes, must track the hierarchical relationships of all site map nodes in order to be able to navigate an entire hierarchical tree. 如果找不到屬性，類別偵測到目前的站台對應提供者是否有屬性。If a property is not found, the class detects whether the current site map provider has a property. 如果站台，對應提供者呼叫父站台地圖提供者的屬性。If so, the site map provider calls the property for the parent site map provider. 這可讓不同的站台地圖提供者位置維護站台對應節點的父站台對應節點的案例。This enables the scenario where the parent site map node of a site map node is maintained by a different site map provider. 方法呼叫方法在內部用來擷取表示指定的站台對應節點的父系。The method calls the method internally to retrieve the that represents the parent of the specified site map node. 如果已啟用安全性調整，只有當允許使用者檢視它，會傳回站台對應節點。If security trimming is enabled, the site map node is returned only if the user is permitted to see it.

span.span: is .
